Description: Flat cast copper alloy figure of ithyphallic Amun or Min; plumes of the headdress damaged; right arm raised and holding a flail; left hand at the phallus; collar incised round the neck; suspension loop behind the head; feet lost; 2 double plumes and flail and collar incised; divine (?) beard broken off at chin.
Curator's comments: Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): p.17
